def count_distinct_arrays(array, n):
    MOD = 1000000008

    def fun(a, cur, n, cnt):
        if cur >= n - 1:
            return
        for i in range(cur, n - 1):
            if i < n - 2:
                if a[i] > 0 and a[i + 1] > 0:
                    a[i] -= 1
                    a[i + 1] -= 1
                    a[i + 2] += 1
                    cnt[0] = (cnt[0] + 1) % MOD
                    fun(a, i, n, cnt)
                    a[i] += 1
                    a[i + 1] += 1
                    a[i + 2] -= 1
            elif a[i] > 0 and a[i + 1] > 0:
                a[i] -= 1
                a[i + 1] -= 1
                a.append(1)
                cnt[0] = (cnt[0] + 1) % MOD
                fun(a, i, n + 1, cnt)
                a[i] += 1
                a[i + 1] += 1
                a.pop()
    cnt = [1]
    fun(array, 0, n, cnt)
    return cnt[0] % MOD
